item.title: How AI PR startup Clipbook won Mark Cuban’s investment from a cold email
item.description: Adam Joseph was shocked when Mark Cuban replied to his email with an inquisition full of questions.

item.title: At least 80 new tech unicorns were minted in 2025 so far
item.description: Using data from Crunchbase and PitchBook, TechCrunch tracked down the VC-backed startups that became unicorns so far this year.

item.title: Black Forest Labs raises $300M at $3.25B valuation
item.description: The round was co-led by Salesforce Ventures and Anjney Midha (AMP), and saw participation from a16z, NVIDIA, Northzone, Creandum, Earlybird VC, BroadL...

item.title: Korea’s Coupang says data breach exposed nearly 34M customers’ personal information
item.description: E-commerce company Coupang has confirmed a massive data breach affecting 33.7 million customer accounts in South Korea.

item.title: Varda says it has proven space manufacturing works — now it wants to make it boring
item.description: CEO Will Bruey says people often get Varda wrong. The company isn't "in the space industry; we're in-space industry," he said. Space is "just another ...
